website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a mousse that will make your tight curls and coils more manageable, this moisturizing product is the one to get.
pros: Works great on tight curls and coils thanks to lightweight argan oil formula that defines and moisturizes
Doesn't make hair stiff or crunchy, but gives it a healthy-looking shine
A little goes a long way
cons: Tends to weigh down waves and light curls, especially if you apply too much

customer_reviews.title: Use the curl cream instead not this mousse.
customer_reviews.text: Very sticky and causes hair to be frizzy. Very disappointed. I use the curl cream instead and it works so much better. Would never buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: amandac

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: This was light weight, it had very little smell and what smell there was dissipated quickly. It was okay with my hair, but I felt it was expensive for what it was. I am Caucasian and my hair is thick and naturally curly. This just didn't hold that well for me. Aveda "Be Curly" does a much better job with my hair type.
customer_reviews.author: Loves Fiction

customer_reviews.title: Great for curls!
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair, with big loopy curls. If I don't mousse it, it looks more wavy and frizzy. I have to use a light-weight mousse that doesn't weigh down my delicate curls. I like that this product has a natural pump and is not under pressure. It does tend to get sticky as you get closer to the bottom of the bottle. It is easy to use too much of this product, a little goes a long way. I also really like the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Soopa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't give the "crunchy gel" hair feel, though didn't do much to shape my hair
customer_reviews.text: I got this because a friend swears by it, and says she's able to keep the "regular hair" feel instead of the "crunchy gel" feel. I agree with that part, it is the only mousse / gel I've been able to use that doesn't have that feeling, however, I found my hair looked pretty much the same with the mousse as it does when I let it dry naturally, except that it is much messier the next day after sleeping on it after using the product than it would regularly be with no gel. That could just be my hair type though. Hopefully it works as well for others as I does for my friend!
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and your hair!
customer_reviews.text: Ugh!!!! I LOVE the hair oil in this product line so much it pains me to say that this product is awful! The smell is fine however, it makes my hair feel coated in a plastic coating. It’s not crunchy, it’s more like my hairs are plastic doll hairs. It’s the strangest feeling! My hair looks ok until around 7 in the evening when it suddenly falls flat (I have naturally wavy to curly hair). I won’t be using this product again. I noticed that it leaves even my freshly washed hair feeling like straw after using it which is NOT how my hair normally feels at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wemple

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: You get a perfect curl!! I bread my hair after applied the mousse and in the AM i get a perfect curls!! My friend twisted hers...either way it works for both of us!! No residue, no fuss!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mazi

customer_reviews.title: Soft, manageable, and holds curls . All in one!
customer_reviews.text: I always assumed all Moroccan oil products were heavy and greasy. I tried this as a last effort for my recent switch to short curly fair. It's very lightweight, but manages to keep hair in place. I only need one pump to style, this helps with the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. G.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product, At A Hefty Price.
customer_reviews.text: Being I am allergic to most every mousse on the market, I was gratefully surprised I have not had a topical reaction to this one. I gave it a 4-star instead of a 5 because it is SO expensive--I would not ordinarily by something THIS expensive but my hair is super curly and completely frizzy if I don't mousse it up! If the price was a lot better, I would've EASILY given a 5-star. The product holds the curl maybe not quite as long as others (that I'm sadly allergic to) but for a bit more than a day where I only need to wet my hair the next morning to reactivate the mousse.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Robbins

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy to find it here for half what I paid ...
customer_reviews.text: My son and I have curly hair that can become a pile of frizz in an instant. This is the only product we have found that keeps the curls curly and without frizz. I first found this in a salon where I paid far too much for it, so when I ran out, I was very happy to find it here for half what I paid in the salon. I will continue to purchase this from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: No crunch and it works for every hair type
customer_reviews.text: Throw all your other products away and use this I swear by it. Straight hair now you have waves and curly hair now you have those fresh out the shower curls stay!! It has to be this mousse too not the other one that they make. This one doesn’t make your hair crunchy AT ALL. Put it in your hair after you shower, scrunch it with your hands, your hair may feel kinda soapy it’s fine leave it, scrunch some more, then when your hair finishes air drying be amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great for my hair....LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tightly coiled curls (4 something not sure exactly which type) and this mouse defined the curls and reduced the frizz. I was skeptical about the outcome when It became sudsy while applying. After finger smoothing the product in my hair the curls really popped and I am very pleased. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great results for beautiful bouncy curls. My hairdresser showed me trick... mix it w the Moroccan oil curl defining cream. That mixture gives more definition and frizz control. Juicy defined curls that are still soft. I bought both and hair never looked better.
customer_reviews.author: Andrés &  Mari

customer_reviews.title: Best used on damp hair!
customer_reviews.text: I would never had used anything with oil on my hair with it being fine but I have a good amount. I tried it at a spa because it said mousse for curls and I have a good wave in my hair. It's a foam and you don't need much and I applied it with my fingers and started scrunching and boom..body curls and it holds! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Debra M. Haugen

customer_reviews.title: Mousse didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it is supposed to foam, as it did very little foaming and a lot of plain liquid coming out, making a big mess. I used it anyway and it was just too much. My hair didn't fall into ringlets like it does what other types of mousse.
customer_reviews.author: N. Leitner

customer_reviews.title: Is this Real or Fake?
customer_reviews.text: I question that what I received is Real Moroccan Oil product. I typically purchase from another beauty retailer and love the Curl Control Mousse. Hair is usually soft and wavy. What I just received left my hair dry and frizzy!
customer_reviews.author: Kmball

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It’s the only product I’ve found that is thick enough to get good coverage on my unruly curls and it controls the frizz better than anything else I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alternative to mooses that can make hair crunchy
customer_reviews.text: I love this form. I have natural curls, and this form defines them without weighing them down. Only downside is that is doesn't wear well into day 2 and 3, so you have to be careful to use it sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: Ln White

customer_reviews.title: Didn't smell amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the way this enhances my natural curl. I loved the smell in the past. This one didn't have that amazing smell. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Great for my wavy hair
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We just moved to Florida, I found my hair a little dry, and I didn't want to have to do a lot with it either. This product is a perfect solution for my hair. I may switch to their shampoo and conditioner as well.
customer_reviews.author: Concetta R Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Curls love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow ladies and gentlemen, I was wincing at the price originally but I only ever splurge on my hair and skin care so I purchased this and it’s incredible! Granted I wish you get more for your money, but I do my hair every other day or so and have a decent amount left.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Smell is awful, fake?
customer_reviews.text: I use the Moroccanoil products. I love the smell. However when i ordered this particular brand the smell was horrible. I'm not sure if it's a knockoff or if it somehow expired (there's no printed date). I've asked around and everyone tells me it should smell like all other products. It definitely doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: S Gris

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing for my curly hair! I love it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Floridagirl0607

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over a year. On hair right of shower. Just a bit in the palm of your hand. Gives hair nice shine and easy to work with. Manages your hair. Best I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Marinedudejoe

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it’s the real rhing
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t smell like it should, which leads me to believe it’s fake or way past it’s prime. I think I’ve learned my lesson with ordering hair products and perfume from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: SandyNevada

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my naturally curly hair. Recommended by my hairdresser.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Produc
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mousse that holds my curl very well in humid conditions
customer_reviews.author: Dr. White

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for curly, thinning hair.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It helps give my hair volume, controls the curls so it's not frizzy, and yet leaves my hair nice and soft. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel S. Druce

customer_reviews.title: Works well must learn the amount for your hair.
customer_reviews.text: Works well must learn the amount for your hair. Too much product = flat oily hair
customer_reviews.author: Lady Bug

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A little bit goes a long way. It works great..
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Vestal

customer_reviews.title: First misstep by Moroccan oil
customer_reviews.text: I dont like this product at all .... It is the first mousse I have used that has left my hair greasy and it is heavily perfumed. YUCK I love their other products but this one was a miss.
customer_reviews.author: Piadoodle

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging, leaked before I got it
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but the packaging was poor. The bottle leaked during transport and delivery :( bummed I don’t get the full bottle now. The smell to this is amazing and makes your curls look perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Curl definition
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product - holds and defines the curl without the frizz!
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Why not
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was buying the animal but it's spelled "Moose". Lame
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie02061975

customer_reviews.title: I believe that my hair might be too fine to use this to tame my curls
customer_reviews.text: I believe that my hair might be too fine to use this to tame my curls. I love the scent! I am going to pass it along to my sisters to see if it works for them.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley W.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it works like magic. My curls are so beautiful thanks to this product. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Santana

customer_reviews.title: Really like this. Holds curls well and does not make ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like this. Holds curls well and does not make them at all crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser recommended this product. I have relatively short wavy hair. A little foam and my hair is read to go for the day. It gives fullness in the back. I am traveling and it is wonderful not to have to spend a lot of time on your hair--just apply the mousse, use hairspray and you are ready for the day! A blessing... My husband likes the smell and likes the fulness it gives my hair.
customer_reviews.author: dmh1218

customer_reviews.title: Great for natural hair
customer_reviews.text: Defined my curls very well and I only had to use a little bit. Long lasting cccurls nice scent my favorite product for my natural hair.
customer_reviews.author: my3sons612

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: First mousse that doesn’t leave my hair crunchy and gives me nicely clumped curls!!! Virtually NO FRIZZ! Those with curly hair know that it’s impossible to completely get rid of the FRIZZ. This is now my go to hair product and I use it in conjunction with a smidgeon of the SheaMoisture coconut gel. Hair Type: 2C-3A
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Like the product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but it did come wrapped in 2 bags and was leaking so for how expensive it is I just hope I didn't lose too much of the mousse?!?
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for straight thin hair
customer_reviews.text: This mousse is expensive but it really works. You need a small drop for short hair to hold a style and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this product and brand is great for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: this product and brand is great for curly hair. My curly hair constantly frizzes. This one tames the frizz and keeps my curly looking healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It smells okay but didn't give me much of a curl.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Lippincott

customer_reviews.title: The smell is not the same as the cream loved the cream better
customer_reviews.text: For some reason for my curls they work but I can’t used a lot too heavy on my hair
customer_reviews.author: Anna A

customer_reviews.title: Great for my unruly curls!
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair and it goes crazy in humid weather. This product gives my hair a soft, non-frizzy look that I love.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne L.

customer_reviews.title: have been using it for over 5 years
customer_reviews.text: tried different products but they were either too heavy or too light. this one keeps my curls in place and is not making them freezy even after a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: marina

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my curls!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never written an Amazon review before, but this product was so damaging to my hair I felt compelled to do so. I’ve never had issues with frizz. I was just looking to tone down my curls a bit. Now my curl pattern is gone and my hair is extremely frizzy and dry – stay away!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia cohen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it for my hair! I have soft curls but it didn't do anything for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan pf this product for use in ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan pf this product for use in my naturally curly bi-racial hair, i use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product since it hit the market for sell, I love it very much and it does straighten the hair as it says. I am a African American women who wears her hair very short, and like it straight. If u are in my shoes give this wonderful product a go. I did!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cherokee

customer_reviews.title: Deals with my curls
customer_reviews.text: This product makes my curls do what I want them to do! Very gentle; makes my hair shine.
customer_reviews.author: FMS

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work well with my thick curly hair. Not enough control. LeVes a residue on my hair
customer_reviews.author: LGM

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: I did not like how this product smelled, it's texture, or how it made my hair feel. The only reason it gets two stars is because it did keep frizz at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Richter

customer_reviews.title: DIDNT Work
customer_reviews.text: I want to RETURN THIS ITEM! I Cant See Return Option at all. It didnt do anything to my hair, instead made it rough..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mousse! I have lots of fine, curly hair. This product is light enough yet strong enough to plump up my curls without weighing down each fine hair. My girlfriend gave it to me because she didn't like it. She has fuller, thicker curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: moroccanoil curl mousse
customer_reviews.text: I love all Moroccan oil products. These products smell great, work efficiently and provide a good deal of moisture to your hair. During the summer I wear my hair curly and I would not go without using this product. I have several Moroccan items and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is marketed ad a curl control mousse. I do t need curl control but it works very well for volume, especially in humid summer weather.
customer_reviews.author: chrisbel

customer_reviews.title: Curl Defining Mousse
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this product. It smells oh so good and the price was reasonable. It seals the moisture in my hair with the assistance of defining my curl. It is lightweight and does not cake up in your hair. I am very happy. Will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Angeana St Rose-rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: My results were extra curl on my naturally curly hair ...
customer_reviews.text: My results were extra curl on my naturally curly hair on back of my head but nothing on wavy hair on top and front of my head.
customer_reviews.author: Lily’s personal assistant

customer_reviews.title: Great curl enhancer!
customer_reviews.text: This product really enhances & controls my naturally curly hair. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again and again
customer_reviews.text: Love how well it works! It doesn't make my curls hard like most curl control products do. It was exactly what I was looking for and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great on fine,curly thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I combine the Moroccanoil curl defining mousse with the Moroccanoil intense curl creme. They work very well together to create definition in your curl pattern, especially if you flat twist hair and let air dry and take loose to shape.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! It has a slightly off putting smell when you first put it on, but I like how it feels once it is in. It doesn't leave my hair greasy or crunchy!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I have used this product in the past but I purchased it at a salon. This is not the same stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Great mousse
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Smells awesome and works great on my curly hair. So far the best.
customer_reviews.author: ads

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This help my usual frizzy hair have more defined curls, I will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I was very surprised because I usually love the Morroccanoil products
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if it was this particular item or the product in general, but the mouse was so watery and dried so sticky. I was very surprised because I usually love the Morroccanoil products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great products!  A little pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this line... little to no build up on the hair... produces great curls!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spilled
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, but item was badly leaking spilled while opening!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin N

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: moroccanoil brand products rock anyway. this one is perfect for curly and wavy hair. it gives you that extra hold, reduces frizz, doesn't get hard to the touch, smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! !
customer_reviews.text: Control without crunch and shine for days. And you don't need alot, 2 pumps will do the trick on my short hair.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, and will continue to purchase it.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It never makes my hair feel heavy or crunchy, like other mousse products have done to my hair in the past.

customer_reviews.title: Okay Product
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work well on my hair, it left my hair feeling sticky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. I will continue to use this product.

customer_reviews.title: Frizzball Hair
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of the Moroccan Oil line but this mousse did not meet previously purchased product standards. Left my hair dry and dull, no fullness or volume. Did not do a good job of separating and holding curls and waves. Left my hair a frizzball. Do not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well on curly hair - will be purchasing this again

customer_reviews.title: This was not the product I bought at the salon ...
customer_reviews.text: This was not the product I bought at the salon!! Leaves hair soapy!! Something wrong w it or not authentic!

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product for the first time and it has an amazing smell and your hair stays so soft. Not hard and yucky.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Not too heavy. No build up. Definitely worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product- gives volume and takes away the frizzy's and smells wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.text: So glad my hairdresser recommended this awesome product - I have tried them all but this is the winner for me.
customer_reviews.author: Theresia

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME product for frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. After using the Moroccanoil Intense Curl Cream, I apply this product as directed on the package and my hair looks VERY healthy and tame. My natural curl is more a wavey curl, but these two products define the curls and manage everything really well. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Burgo49

customer_reviews.title: Best Curl Mousse
customer_reviews.text: I've tried every mousse there is and this is the best. I hope they always make it. It's light but enough product to hold a nice curl. I have very curly hair and this tames it and makes into nicely shaped curls with just a little scrunching and blow drying or air during. I do use curling iron on very humid days and this seems to protect the ends as well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Froze

customer_reviews.title: Soo mazing... Better than ouidad and diva
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product..... first time after trying diva ouidad it has the most amazing no crunch hold with the best definition
customer_reviews.author: Sissyloo

customer_reviews.title: This product is fantastic. Controls frizz without weighing down my hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very coarse and curly hair. This product is fantastic. Controls frizz without weighing down my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Daughtry

customer_reviews.title: I have very fine hair with a small amount of curl that becomes ...
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair with a small amount of curl that becomes fuzzy, so needed a product that would address both issues. This product has more than met my expections, gives my fine hair body & gets rid of the fuzzy curl. It seems a little heavy at first but after working it in lightins up. I see my self using this product from now on.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Is it supposed to smell bad?
customer_reviews.text: Not thrilled with this product. Wondering if it's expired. It has no positive fragrance like other products from this manufacturer, and the mouse still allows hair to frizz just as much as it did before. :-/ I'll stick with Kenra extra volume mousse firm hold for my super curls when I need a mousse. I love the curl defining cream so thought I would try this, but bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty heavy for a mousse-it makes my hair look oily
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty heavy for a mousse-it makes my hair look oily. Might be good for someone with extremely frizzy hair.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi  Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Does not feel like the real stuff
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I ordered this product from somewhere other than the actual company. The label of the product did not completely match the real product I had ordered previously from Moroccanoil website. Also, the mousse felt different, it was very sticky and immediately turned to a thin liquid when I rubbed it in my hands. Not quality moroccanoil product!
customer_reviews.author: JenCarp

customer_reviews.title: Morracan Oil
customer_reviews.text: My daughters and I love this product! Received it as expected and will order it again. I recommend this for others.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this mouse! It controls the friezes and smells wonderful .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think I really like it!
customer_reviews.text: First time to use the mousse! I think I really like it!

customer_reviews.title: ♡ Moroccan oil products...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my curls curly and keeps the frizzy away! Leaves a lightweight feel to my hair too...
customer_reviews.author: ekd.1978

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED
customer_reviews.text: This product is EXPIRED and the company rubbed off the expiration date on the side. They also rubbed off the little thing you can scan with an app to view the product. I feel this is EXTREMELY dishonest of them to sell a product that is expired. The listing does not state it was expired. Buyers be aware- you are not getting the product that you paid for. Moroccanoil does expire and is less effective when it is expired. Buy from honest sellers somewhere else!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to Like It
customer_reviews.text: Moroccan Oil is just over priced for what it is. This mousse was very liquidy and not very effective. My hair was still frizzy after use, and this product didn't hold my curl well. There are other, cheaper, more natural products out there that work a lot better for my curls.
customer_reviews.author: Ashtyn

customer_reviews.title: Weird
customer_reviews.text: I am not so happy about the results. Plus, this product can be opened and anyone can put whatever they want inside. I don't get why someone would do a hair product that doesn't come sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Viridiana

customer_reviews.title: didn;t like it much
customer_reviews.text: it was okay ! i probably would not purchase it again. I did define my curls slightly but it also shrink my fro ( I am natural) significantly. i also felt like it dried my hair after it dried.it not for me
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need to try another product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't define my curls well, using too much makes hair feel sticky. I am much happier with the shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.author: Joy

product_meta.title: Moroccanoil Curl Control Mousse, 5.1 Fl. Oz.
product_meta.description:
Moroccanoil Curl Control Mousse tames curly, coily and tightly-spiraled hair without leaving behind a sticky residue. Infused with antioxidant-rich argan oil, this airy, lightweight foam helps enhance curl shape and separation, seal in moisture and fight frizz. Provides long-lasting definition, touchable texture and natural hold. Fragranced with the signature Moroccanoil scent, an exotic blend of spicy amber aromas and sweet floral notes.

BRAND STORY:
A story of success, an impulse for innovation and a relentless pursuit of high-performing oil-infused beauty products fashioned an iconic brand: Moroccanoil.

specifications.Manufacturer: Camrose Trading Inc. DBA Fragrance Express
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
